name: Rock Roller vs Paper
description:
This is my first ever game jam, thanks for playing! FULL SCREEN HIGHLY RECOMMENDED AS I DID NOT SCALE WELL LOL

  • Weeks theme: Rock, Paper, Scissors
  • Made for Weekly Game Jam 154

Roll around as a rock and avoid the papers, they will kill you instantly (for obvious reasons). Collect scissors to power up your explosion ability, where you shed off smaller rocks in random directions!

Final Boss: Le Papier
